headline: lululemon athletica inc. (LULU): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on lululemon athletica inc. on Valueinvesting subreddit by OneTarget9322. headline: Wells Fargo cuts Lululemon target on margin pressure
summary: Investing.com -- Wells Fargo lowered its price target on Lululemon Athletica (NASDAQ:LULU) to $225 from $270 and reiterated an Equal Weight rating, citing persistent weakness in U.S. trends, margin pressures in China, and increasing headwinds from markdowns and tariffs.

headline: Former Coupa CPO Michael Van Keulen Joins Flywl as Strategic Advisor
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 04, 2025--Flywl, the cloud marketplace platform for enterprise software procurement, is proud to announce that Michael Van Keulen (MVK), former Chief Procurement Officer at Coupa, will join the company as a Strategic Advisor effective August 1.
